recipe.title: Marinated Mixed Beans
ingredients: 1/2 cup finely chopped tender herbs (such as mint, parsley, cilantro, chives, and/or dill)
2 (15-ounce) cans cannellini beans, navy beans, black-eyed peas, or chickpeas, or a mix, rinsed
1 teaspoon Aleppo-style pepper or gochugaru (coarse Korean hot pepper flakes)
instructions: Combine shallot and vinegar in a small bowl and let sit 5 minutes. Meanwhile, mix herbs and oil in a large bowl to coat herbs. Add beans and red pepper and toss to combine. Season generously with salt. Add shallot mixture to bean mixture and toss gently to combine.
